text: Dhriti.

He had to lie about his job
because it was a dangerous one.
I didn't want to endanger your lives.
But I have failed, and I am so sorry.
No, Dad. You didn't.
You are the coolest dad in the world.
Pa, pick any song in the world.
I can play anything now!

Do you intend to torture me
with that all the way home?
Papa, please! Name a song!
"Sare jahan se achha."

What kind of a song is that?
Name a song from a movie.
From a movie?
Alright, then.
O, darling! O, darling!
O, darling! O, darling!
Flowers are blooming--
What song is this?

Don't ask anyone else that,
unless you want to be humiliated!

It's a song from a classic film
called, "Sholay."
I am going to play "Senorita" for you.

Don't blow so hard,
it'll come out of your rear end.
Look into my eyes!
There is no pain.
No pain.
No--
No pain?

I want to talk to your
sister, so off you go!
You can call me an "a*shole" anytime.
How are you feeling now?
Dad…
I've killed a human being.
You killed a terrorist.
Dhriti.
Kalyan aka Salman… was a terrorist.

He was brainwashed and recruited
to kill innocent people.
Stop feeling guilty. You're very brave.
And he's still alive.
Really?
He's in the government hospital.

He'll be sent to jail
as soon as he recovers.

So, all these years, you
lied about your job?
Dhriti.

He had to lie about his job
because it was a dangerous one.

Both of you were too young
to understand these things.

So, we decided to keep it
a secret till you got older.
I wanted to protect you guys.
I didn't want to endanger your lives.
But I have failed, and I am so sorry.
No, Dad. You didn't.
You are the coolest dad in the world.
Thank you.
What did the doctor say?

After what she's been through,
she needs immediate counseling.
Did he…
I mean, with Dhriti… did he…
did he force himself on her in any way?

-No, no. Not at all.
-Thank God!

-Is he really alive?
-Who?
Whatever his name is… Kalyan… Salman.
He's dead.

you didn't want your husband to be
working in a dangerous environment.
You wanted him to do a conventional job.

But as soon as Srikant found himself
a corporate job, you quit your job.

That's because I wanted to
spend more time with the kids.
And you, Srikant.
Switching jobs…
must have been tough.
Any trouble adapting to your new life?
Not really.
I adapt very quickly. I am alright.

For the time being,
let us set this discussion aside.
Let us do a simple exercise, okay?
Srikant…
tell me five things…
you are grateful to Suchitra for.
Five things?
I-I mean, why only five?

There are many things which
I really admire about her.
I mean…
like, I am really grateful that…

she never lets the kids feel
my absence in their lives.
And…
and…

she's a very good Bharatanatyam dancer.
She excels at it.
And sambar… she cooks it so well!
And rasam!
Yeah!

Even if you count sambar and rasam,
that's only four things, Sri.
He put me on the spot.

You should've warned me about this
quiz show. I would have come prepared.
Okay, Srikant! Relax!
Now, your turn.
He's a great dad.
He's a very principled man.
Great sense of humor.
Very intelligent.
He's very committed and hardworking.
And…
he can cook up a lie at the drop of a hat.
Okay, now.

How physically intimate
are you with each other?
As in…

-how often--
-How often what?

I mean to ask how physically
intimate you are in life.
Generally, you know.
Are you asking…
how many times we have s*x?
Physical intimacy is just not about s*x.
It's much more.
It's an indicator of your emotional bond.
Holding hands.

A hug or a kiss before leaving for work.
Cuddling.
These are…
quite personal details!

Srikant, stop looking
at s*x as a taboo subject.

You should be able
to talk openly about it.
Is this a joke?
This is so childish!

I'll get better advice than this
from a simple search on my phone.

Mr. Srikant, you can become
knowledgeable from others' knowledge.

But you cannot become
wise from others' wisdom.
You can find this quote on Google!
I never said it was my quote.
Even I know a few quotes.

"If you and I agree on everything,
then one of us is unnecessary,

-for f*ck's sake."
-Keep quiet.
"Sometimes, to win, you must lose first,

and he who wins after losing
is called the Gambler."

-What?
-"Beyond fear lies victory."

"To the victor go the spoils."
"Motherf*cker!"

-Suchitra, what is this?
-He's a doctor!

-We are paying for these quotes?
-This is a therapy session!
F*ck it! I am not part of it!

-I am not part of it!
-Srikant!
He's a fraud!
Now, you will only hear my words!
You will do everything as I say.
You will take me with you…
on a three-week holiday!
Shut up!
There will be no holiday!
Go to school and study!

Dad, you can't get
up in the middle of this!

I was taking you into
a deep state of relaxation!
I am done with the deep state, okay?
Now, I am in an alert state.
Or else, I'll miss my flight!

You should know that parents
should encourage children,
and their natural talents!
Okay, my little boy!
You did really well! Good job!
I have all my hopes pinned on you!
You'll make me proud!
We'll continue when I am back, okay?
Bye!
Now, let me pack.

You were supposed to send me
that report like five hours ago!
What?
I am having a really bad day.
Just leave me alone.
Excuse me?
Oh, man! Please!
Please, leave me alone.
My conference room! Now!
Follow me!
Listen!
I won't mince my words!

The only reason you got this
job is because of your brother!
And I tried to respect your age.

But there is a certain order in
this office and I cannot tolerate--
Motherf*cker! I've heard enough!
You get on my nerves!
Nobody--

Don't say another word!
If I hear a squeak out of you, I'll…
No, but--
You can't--

-How dare you--
-What did I just tell you?
If you hear a squeak out of me, you'll--
What did I just say?
Moron!
I quit!
Stupid f*ck!
Security!
Security!
What emergency do you have?
Listen, let's meet for lunch? My treat.

I am in Chennai.
In the middle of a hostage situation.

-What?
-I'll talk to you later.

Wait, wait, wait!
Tell me what's happening there.

We were supposed to take
a suspect to the safe house,
but that guy killed some of our men…

and is now cooped up
in a room with two hostages.

-Who's working with you?
-Local TASC officers.
And who's the subject?
I can't divulge the details to you!
You little f*ck, just tell me!
Subramaniam Palanivel.
Do you remember the Sri Lankan rebels?
What the f*…
My sister is visiting us for Rakhi.
What nonsense are you talking about?
I don't have time for this sh*t!

Wait, listen!
Can't they call in the NSG for this?
No, we can't.

Kulkarni is very clear.
This operation is totally off the books.
There can be no leaks.
We have direct orders from Delhi.

I think, either the NSA
or PMO is involved.
Brad!
No, no! I'll be sending those TPS reports…

-What?
-to Andrews.
I'll also be changing the font color.
Yeah… back to blue.
And I'll be adding some colorful stuff!

What the f*ck are you blabbering about?
Are you high?

My manager just stopped by.
Screw that, what were you saying?
The f*cker, Subbu, refuses to negotiate.
I'll call you later, okay?
Don't call back! Enjoy the AC!
Bye, Talpade! Bye!
Weren't you just talking to Brad?
Yes, I was… and then, I switched the call.
So, personal call?
Sort of, semi-personal.

Remember, Srikant!
Don't be a "minimum guy."
Okay?
Good!
Yes?
Any update? Has Subbu made any demands?
Oh. I am so sorry, sir.

It completely slipped my mind
to give you hourly updates! Sorry!
Shove your sarcasm up your a*s!
You're suffering from FOMO.
FOMO?
Fear of missing out, Uncle!
I am trying to help you.

I had an interesting idea
that I wanted to share with you.
But if you don't want it, that's fine!

FOMO, LOLO, ROFLO…
take it all up your a*s.
JK! Just hear me out for a minute!
All right, tell me.
Chellam!
Who the hell is Chellam?
You don't know who Chellam is?

Can we play "Who wants to be
a millionaire" some other time?
I am in the middle of a hostage situation!
Chellam is the legendary agent…

who used to run missions in
Sri Lanka during the civil war.

And I think he is close
friends with Bhaskaran.

And our current RAW Chief
was mentored by Chellam.

Tell Sharma to call Chellam right away.
He's retired now, but that won't matter.
Are you serious?

No, I am making up stories
just to mess with you!
Just do as I say!
